title: "Data Visualisation using Rmd"
author: limxh
date: 9/12/21
output: html_document
---

```{r, echo = FALSE}
A <- c(1, 1, 2, 3)
B <- c(5, 10, 15, 20)
dataframe <- data.frame(A, B)
plot(dataframe)
```
```{r, echo = FALSE}
data<-read.csv("../data/testData1.csv")

print(data)

data$ï..date<- as.Date(data$ï..date, "%m/%d/%Y")

plot(x = data$date,cases_new = data$y,
	xlab = "date",
	ylab = "new cases",
	xlim=c(0,9999999),
	ylim=c(0,25000),
	main = "Plot"
)

```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
data=read.csv("../data/covid19-public-main/epidemic/cases_malaysia.csv")

print(data)

plot(x = data$date,cases_new = data$y,
	xlab = "x-axis",
	ylab = "y-axis",
	ylim=c(0,25000),
	main = "Plot"
)
```
